--- title: Features keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "This module contains all the necessary functions for extracting and organizing features from videos." ---

CNNExtractor.extract[source]

CNNExtractor.extract(img)

Given an image, extract features from the layers of a CNN. Returns the feature vector.

SIFTExtractor.extract[source]

SIFTExtractor.extract(img)

Given an iamge, extract features using SIFT. Returns the feature vector.

class Extractor[source]

Extractor(learn, linear_output_layer, model, isFT)

CNNExtractor.extract[source]

CNNExtractor.extract(img)

Given an image, extract features from the layers of a CNN. Returns the feature vector.

SIFTExtractor.extract[source]

SIFTExtractor.extract(img)

Given an iamge, extract features using SIFT. Returns the feature vector.

class SIFTExtractor[source]

SIFTExtractor(learn, linear_output_layer, model, isFT) :: Extractor

Exposed SIFTExtractor class used for retrieving features.

class CNNExtractor[source]

CNNExtractor(learn, linear_output_layer, model, isFT) :: Extractor

Exposed CNNExtractor class used for retrieving features.

imgs = get_rand_imgs(video_paths[0], 30_000, n = 100)

Three different extraction techniques:

learn, linear_output_layer = cnn.trainPetsModel()
extractor = CNNExtractor(cnn.createExtractor(learn, linear_output_layer, 'resnet50', True))
extractor = CNNExtractor(cnn.createExtractor(None, None, 'resnet50', False))
extractor = CNNExtractor(cnn.createLayeredExtractor())

Using the extractor to get features:

features = extractor.extract(imgs[0])

gen_vcodebook[source]

gen_vcodebook(imgs, extractor, vwords=10000)

Constructs a visual codebook based on the given images. You can change vwords to increase the vocabulary of the codebook.

vwords = 20
codebook = gen_vcodebook(imgs, extractor, vwords)

get_df[source]

get_df(imgs, extractor, codebook)

Generates the document frequency for the visual words

df = get_df(imgs, extractor, codebook)

get_bovw[source]

get_bovw(vid_path, extractor, codebook)

Generates the bag of visual words (bovw) for an entire video.

hist, bovw = get_bovw(video_paths[3], extractor, codebook)

calc_tf_idf[source]

calc_tf_idf(tfs, dfs)

tf_idf_pix2 = calc_tf_idf(hist, df)
